modName: Rama_s Perfect Female Skin Skyrim Mod
summary: This light-weight mod (about 10.5 mb) gives all non-beast females perfect, high resolution rich glowy skin.
descriptionHtml:
Rama\'s Perfect Skin Mod

This is a very light-weight mod, of 3 files only, compressed as about 10.5 MB

But it gives all the non-beast female bodies perfect skin!

I can\'t live without this mod, now that I have it :)

All the girls\' skin looks so clear and vibrant and happy now :)

---

Adding Pics of Your Own

If anyone wants to add pics of their female characters using my perfect skin mod,

you can click the two-rectangle icon below the version number near top of this page.

I will verify your pics post-inspection which may take awhile depending on my schedule.

==========
Mod Details
==========

Innocent Pure Beauty

This mod does not impose any of my artistic ideas about how MUCH skin the women of skyrim should be revealing.

This mod simply makes the skin that is exposed more beautiful, clear, vibrant, and young.

I honor all women.

This mod is simply to make Skyrim women younger and prettier, with more vibrant skin tone.

---

Note on the Pictures for this Mod: 

Color and Hue and Brightness Settings

I play Skyrim with an ultra high level of color saturation and brightness because I like the \"fantasy\" look, as if I was in a world of brilliant happy colors where everything is alive and vibrant.

I found the default color settings for Skyrim to be de-saturated, so I went completely the other way.

As a result, my sense of how a Skyrim scene looks to those of you not using similar high brightness and saturation is skewed. I literally don\'t know how the scene \"should\" look for all of you.

So if you think my pictures are oddly bright or parts of the world have unusual color intensity, those are just my own personal settings and do not affect the mod or your own personal experience with my mod.

* * *

So please try my mod for yourself to see how it will look on your computer with your settings.

I cannot show you pictures that will give you a completely accurate representation of how it will look on your machine.

Fortunately, this mod is easy to undo if you don\'t like it.

This mod does not damage or alter any original installation files

* * *

Give It a Try

Try this mod out before deciding how good it is based on the low-res pictures I have uploaded which you cannot even view in their entire size easily.

* * *

This is the sort of mod you need to see in-motion, live, in-game!

* * *

When you see your girl in motion, 

running around blowing stuff up and looking like a Hot Goddess the whole time, you will understand why I cannot live without my mod.


My enjoyment of Skyrim went to a whole new level once I made my mod.

---

To Install

Copy the zipped folder series, starting with \"Data\" into the _same directory as your TESV.exe file_, probably under 

c:\\program files(x86)/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/

To get to the location I am describing, start by going to your computer\'s main hard drive, probably C:\\ using My Computer, then click on the hard drive, then go to program files and follow the above path.

There might already be a Data folder in your main Skyrim directory, if you have any other mods. 

When copying the file structure for this mod, starting with Data, select the option to overwrite any duplicate files, assuming you don\'t have any other female skin mods installed.

Remember there are only three files in all these folders in the zipped download, so selecting \"overwrite any duplicates\" will only effect a maximum of 3 files.


Sorry for the lack of nexus download manager support at present, you should learn to do these things directly though, it will become more important to be intimately familiar with your Skyrim file structure once the Creation Kit comes out.

You need to know how modding works yourself so you can undo anything other people\'s mods do to your skyrim file structure, because they won\'t always tell you how to undo the damage.

---

How Modding Works

* * *

This is essential information for you to know so that you are in charge of your Skyrim Reality. 

* * *


Our friends at Bethesda were so nice to make modding so easy.

Basically, any files you put into a folder called Data, in your root Skyrim folder where \"TESV.exe\" is located will be preferred by Skyrim when it launches.

Skyrim dynamically checks the contents of your custom Data folder each time you load Skyrim.

So to see changes you\'ve made to your Data folder you have to quit and re-launch Skyrim.


To undo any mods, you go into the Data file structure and delete the appropriate files.


If you don\'t have a \"Data\" folder you can make one.


Most likely you do have a Data folder if you\'ve found this mod of mine :)


The reason mods can have conflicts is because sometimes mods modify the same files in the Data file structure, and Skyrim can only pic one version of that file to use at a time.

---

How to Test a New Mod Easily, Wile Preserving Your Previous Modded Skyrim Settings

If you want to test a mod, rename existing files that you do not wish to overwrite permanently, and try the new mod that modifies those same files.

If you don\'t like the new mod you tried, delete the files and rename the originals.

For example, if you already have a femalebody_1.dds in your Data/textures/actor/character/female folder structure, you can rename it to femalebody_1.back and then try my mod which has its own version of femalebody_1.dds

---

What Are .DDS Files?

To view/edit .dds files, download PAINT.net, it is free

---

How Can I Access Skyrim\'s Original Textures, Models/Meshes, and All other Game Data?

To extract files from Skyrim\'s core .bsa files,

google search for \"FO3_Archive_Utility-34.zip\"

or \"FO3 archive utility\"

FO3 = FallOut 3

This is how you can view the entire file structure of all meshes, textures, and everything else for Skyrim, extract, and play with these files.

Then move these files to the Data folder as I describe above to try your own mods.

---

Compatibility 

This Mod is compatible with all Armor mesh mods that expose more female Skin.

This Mod is not compatible with any mods that modify the default female body skin textures.


This Mod is VERY compatible with Bella\'s Prettier Female Faces mods and all other female facial mods.

This Mod is VERY compatible with all hair mods.

---

To Uninstall

1. Navigate to your main skyrim dir where TESV.exe is located, probably  c:\\program files(x86)/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/        (no x86 for XP users)

2. Navigate to Data/Textures/Actors/Character/Female

3. delete these 3 files:

femalebody_1.dds
femalebody_1_msn.dds
femalehands_1.dds

---

Known Issue

The border between where the hand mesh starts and the end of the arm is located is slightly obvious even in the original skyrim textures, my mod makes this border a little more obvious. 

Since I am always wearing hand gear this doesn\'t ever show to me during gameplay


1st person views of the hands are not affect, hands look younger and happier

---

Other Mods Used in the pictures:

Coolsims Hair Pack

Bella\'s Prettier Female Faces Mod


Many thanks to both of them for enhancing my Skyrim experience!

---

Victory to You All!

Rama
author: Rama
